SYNOPSIS:	
Billed as "The Document of the Reich Party Day 1934", this documentary of the 1934 Nazi Nuremburg Rally is also one of the most infamous propanganda films ever made.  Riefenstahl and her camera crew used many innovative camera techniques that she would later use and expand upon in her later masterpiece, Olympia (1938).

OTHER:		There are other torrents out there for AVI files of this same DVD, but the video quality on this one is better.  Also included is a Riefenstahl short film, Tag der Freiheit (Day of Freedom) (1935).  Burn tested in ConvertXtoDVD.
